title: Ouija Boards - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/28/21
itunes:title: Ouija Boards - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/28/21
description:
George Noory and author Karen Dahlman explore her research into ouija boards, if they are truly portals to communicate with beings in other dimensions, and recount stories of people whose lives have been upended after using a ouija board.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
